2.6. Issued Assets¶

The Issued Assets class is available only for the Elements / Liquid explorer.

2.6.1. Usage¶

from bloxplorer import liquid_explorer as explorer

result = explorer.assets.get('aa775044c32a7df391902b3659f46dfe004ccb2644ce2ddc7dba31e889391caf')
print(result.data)

class bloxplorer.issued_assets.IssuedAssets(*args, **kwargs)¶

Wrapper class around the Esplora Issued Assets endpoint. Only for Elements / Liquid.

Blockstream Esplora Issued Assets API Docs

get(asset_id, **kwargs)¶

Get information about an issued asset.

Parameters

  • asset_id – String representing the issued asset hash.

  • **kwargs – (Optional) Arguments that Requests takes.

Returns

class

Response object.

get_chain(asset_id, last_seen=None, **kwargs)¶

Returns the list of (re)issuance and burn transactions associated with this asset id. Does not include regular transactions transferring this asset.

Parameters

  • asset_id – String representing the issued asset hash.

  • last_seen –

  • **kwargs – (Optional) Arguments that Requests takes.

Returns

class

Response object.

get_mempool(asset_id, **kwargs)¶

Returns the list of (re)issuance and burn transactions associated with this asset id. Does not include regular transactions transferring this asset.

Parameters

  • asset_id – String representing the issued asset hash.

  • **kwargs – (Optional) Arguments that Requests takes.

Returns

class

Response object.

get_txs(asset_id, **kwargs)¶

Returns the list of (re)issuance and burn transactions associated with this asset id. Does not include regular transactions transferring this asset.

Parameters

  • asset_id – String representing the issued asset hash.

  • **kwargs – (Optional) Arguments that Requests takes.
